programme.title: The First 48 - Road Rage (#454)
programme.desc: Season 21, Episode 51 When a father of three is gunned down after confronting a hit-and-run driver, Mobile detectives struggle to find clues that will lead them to his killer.

programme.title: The First 48 - Easy Mark (#438)
programme.desc: Season 21, Episode 38 In Tulsa, when detectives investigate the murder of a man with a troubled past, they uncover a sinister plot.

programme.title: The First 48 - Breaking the Silence / Letters of Intent
programme.desc: Season 7, Episode 7 In Cincinnati, Detectives Keith Witherell and Bill Hilbert attempt to crack the code of silence surrounding the death of a 28-year-old man gunned down on Main Street.

programme.title: The First 48 - Return to Sender / Death Camp
programme.desc: Season 8, Episode 2 In Dallas, Det. Rick Duggan investigates the murder of a young man shot in the backseat of his friend's car. While scouring the crime scene, Duggan finds an interesting lead--mail. He hopes this clue will lead him to the killer.

programme.title: The First 48 - Alias / Duel
programme.desc: Season 9, Episode 8 In Louisville, murder hits close to home when Detective Rick Arnold learns that the victim of his most recent homicide case is the brother of a good friend.

programme.title: Behind Bars: Women Unchained - Behind Bars: Women Unchained
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Across the country, the female inmate population is exploding, as more and more women are coming to prison for longer sentences.

programme.title: Kids Behind Bars: Life or Parole - Deon (2021)
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 3 17-year-old Deon Haynes was sentenced to life in prison for killing former classmate Christy Davis in her home.

programme.title: Kids Behind Bars: Life or Parole - Richard (2021)
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 7 Richard Kinder was 17 when he and a friend committed a robbery that ended in a young woman's death, and the serious injury of her boyfriend. Now 65, Richard has served nearly 50 years of a life without parole sentence.

programme.title: Kids Behind Bars: Life or Parole - The Malvo Effect (2021)
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 10 This episode will chronicle the "DC Sniper" murders, and the battle over sentencing one of the most notorious juvenile murderers in American history.

programme.title: Kids Behind Bars: Life or Parole - Justin (2021)
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 5 What drives a teenage boy to kill his own father? Justin Long was only 15 years old when he violently killed his adoptive father, Hoyt Long.

programme.title: Kids Behind Bars: Life or Parole - The Incorrigibles (2021)
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 8 This special offers an in-depth, side by side examination of two explosive cases involving juveniles initially sentenced to life without the possibility of parole.

programme.title: Behind Bars: Women Unchained - Behind Bars: Women Unchained
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Across the country, the female inmate population is exploding, as more and more women are coming to prison for longer sentences.

programme.title: Naturescape - Naturescape

programme.title: Trace of Evil - Serial Rapist of Sacramento
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 316 The story of a sexual predator and his horrific attacks, how he managed to evade the law for years and how determined investigators, forensic technology and a legal loophole finally tracked him down.

programme.title: The First 48 - Love Hate/ A Soldier's Life
programme.desc: Season 18, Episode 11 In Tulsa, a young woman goes on the run when her boyfriend is murdered. In Atlanta, an army veteran is gunned down after helping a homeless man.

programme.title: The First 48 - A Man's Game
programme.desc: Season 18, Episode 12 In Atlanta, when a young man is shot and left to die in the bushes, a mysterious white Town Car will be the key to Detective Calvin Thomas's investigation.

programme.title: The First 48 - Fatal Mistake
programme.desc: Season 18, Episode 13 A night out leaves an innocent man dead. When solid leads hit dead ends, detectives discover a motive they never expected.

programme.title: After the First 48 - Friends for Life
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 5 In Cleveland Ohio, the body of a dead male is found in the middle of a cold, dark street.

programme.title: After the First 48 - Cold Light of Day
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 6 In Cleveland, Detectives Mike Smith and Walley Everett investigate the murder of a young woman whose body is burned beyond recognition. A key witness comes forward who leads them to the suspect.

programme.title: After the First 48 - Dumped
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 7 In Memphis, Tennessee a man's body is found dumped in a field. Despite every effort, the case goes cold and the murderer remains a mystery. For six years the victim's father investigates the murder on his own, trying to find out who killed his son.

programme.title: After the First 48 - Missing / Deadly Ride
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 8 In Harris County, Texas investigators are called to an abandoned SUV, its interior covered in blood. The vehicle's owner, a 20-year-old single mother, is nowhere to be found.

programme.title: Killer Mysteries - The Devil Next Door
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 62 A look at a woman who was murdered inside her rural Louisiana home.

programme.title: Killer Mysteries - Enforcer of Death
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 63 A look at the murder of a British landlord and his tenant.

programme.title: Killer Mysteries - The Keyes to Murder
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 64 A look at a serial killer who murders victims with his pre-stashed weapons.

programme.title: Killer Mysteries - Homicide in the High Desert
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 65 When the soon-to-be ex-wife of a prominent investment banker dies inside her Arizona home, it initially appears as though she suffered an accidental fall.

programme.title: Bizarre Murders - Dark Horse
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 20 A Georgia attorney falls head over heels for a sexy paralegal with a passion for horse racing, and has no idea she's about to become his worst nightmare.

programme.title: Bizarre Murders - Anything for Love
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 24 As detectives investigate the case of an acid-wielding assailant, they uncover a body in a dumpster and a preposterous identity-swapping plan.

programme.title: Bizarre Murders - American Booty
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 25 While her swinging husband is out of town, a successful New Hampshire woman is beaten to death with a sex paddle.

programme.title: Forensic Factor - Bloody Valentine
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 9 "My wife's bleeding all over the place," Dr. John Baxter Hamilton tells the 911 operator. "I don't know, she looks like somebody hurt her," but the science suggests a crime of heated rage and cold calculation.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Haven
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 105 While on a mission to a planet called Haven, Counselor Troi meets her husband to be, a marriage arranged by her father years before, as the Enterprise encounters a ship far deadlier than any combat could provide.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Where No One Has Gone Before
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 106 The Enterprise is ordered to undergo a series of tests that will propel the ship at unfathomable speed, but Riker has misgivings surrounding the equations and theories presented by the arrogant designer.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - The Last Outpost
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 107 The Enterprise encounters a race known as the Ferengi, a race believed to be more pirates, than traders. But, in the course of the pursuit, all power is lost in the ship, just as the alien ship comes to bear.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Lonely Among Us
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 108 As the Enterprise provides transportation to two delegate parties who are constantly at odds with each other, the ship is invaded by something that jumps from computer terminal to crew members and back again.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Justice
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 109 After dropping off some colonists in a system nearby, The crew visits a world of beautiful, healthy & tanned human looking people who seem to have a peaceful & loving lifestyle.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - The Battle
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 110 After waiting for a response to their hails for three days, Picard finds that the Ferengi have discovered the "Stargazer," an old ship that he once commanded.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Hide and Q
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 111 The Enterprise encounters Q again, and he tempts Riker by endowing him with the powers of the Q.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Too Short a Season
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 112 The Enterprise transports an elderly Starfleet Admiral to negotiate a hostage crisis. When the Admiral takes a de-aging drug, he endangers both his life and the mission.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - The Big Good-Bye
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 113 Captain Picard and some of his crew are caught in a deadly trap in the holodeck as the result of a ship-wide scan from an alien race.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Datalore
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 114 The Enterprise visits the planet where Data was created and discovers another android like him, but when he's assembled, he's not EXACTLY like him.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Angel One
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 115 Riker, Troi, Data and Yar beam down to a planet ruled by a matriarchal government in the hopes of locating a missing freighter crew.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - 11001001
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 116 The Enterprise docks at a starbase for repairs where it is commandeered by a race of technologically-linked aliens intent on using the vessel for their own purposes.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Home Soil
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 117 Picard finds himself facing a strenuous test of his loyalty to Starfleet, one which the other members of the crew are struggling to cope with, whilst Wesley faces an equally challenging entrance exam at Starfleet Academy.

programme.title: Farscape - Farscape: S1 E8 - That Old Black Magic
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 8 Crichton's spirit is captured by Maldis. The sorcerer thrives on vengeance and hate, he brings Crais's spirit down. And the two spirits battle.

programme.title: Area 51 - Area 51
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Three young conspiracy theorists attempt to uncover the mysteries of Area 51, the government's top secret location rumored to have hosted encounters with alien beings. What they find at this hidden facility exposes horrifying, unimaginable secrets.

programme.title: Stephen King's Riding The Bullet - Stephen King's Riding The Bullet
programme.desc:
Season 1, Episode 1 Alan embarks on a 100-mile hitchhike to see his mother in the hospital. Along the way, he must confront his many demons both living and dead, and in the end, make the ultimate choice that will mean life or death for him and his mother! (2005)
Rated R

programme.title: Elvira's Movie Macabre: They Came From Beyond Space - Elvira's Movie Macabre: They Came From Beyond Space
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 After a team of scientists are dispatched to investigate the remnants of a meteor shower, they return controlled by a mysterious alien force.

programme.title: Elvira's Movie Macabre: Monstroid - Elvira's Movie Macabre: Monstroid
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 When a small Colombian village is viciously attacked by a creature from a nearby lake, a corrupt chemical company sends a specialist to destroy the beast and cover up their involvement with its creation.

programme.title: Abduction - Abduction
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Quinn, a member of a SWAT unit, steps out of a park fountain in an Asian city with no recollection of who he is or where he came from. As he pieces together clues from his past, he vaguely recalls his young daughter, who has been kidnapped.

programme.title: Flight 7500 - Flight 7500
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 A flight from Los Angeles to Tokyo is rocked by turbulence—and a terrifying force is unleashed in this spine-chilling journey into fear from the director of The Grudge.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation (Embed) - LEGACY
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 180 The crew of the Enterprise enters into orbit around the home planet of their former crew-mate, Tasha Yar, where they encounter her sister.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation (Embed) - HOME SOIL
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 117 Picard finds himself facing a strenuous test of his loyalty to Starfleet, one which the other members of the crew are struggling to cope with, whilst Wesley faces an equally challenging entrance exam at Starfleet Academy.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation (Embed) - EVOLUTION*
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 150 The Enterprise is carrying an eminent scientist, Dr. Paul Stubbs, to the site of a binary star where they are expecting a massive stellar explosion to occur in a few hours.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Fury
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 23 An old friend returns with a decidedly unfriendly plot to destroy Voyager.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Life Line
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 24 The Doctor seizes an opportunity to save the life of the man who created him.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - The Haunting Of Deck Twelve
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 25 Neelix recounts the harrowing tale of Voyager's newest uninvited guest.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Unimatrix Zero, Part 1
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 26 Captain Janeway faces her biggest battle yet against the Borg—assimilation.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Unimatrix Zero, Part 2
programme.desc: Season 7, Episode 1 Seven's long-lost love lures Janeway into a deadly encounter with the Borg Queen.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Imperfection
programme.desc: Season 7, Episode 2 A malfunction in Seven's cortical node threatens to destroy her.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Drive
programme.desc: Season 7, Episode 3 Tom and B'Elanna's relationship could be the loser when Tom enters a race.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Repression
programme.desc: Season 7, Episode 4 Tuvok's investigation of a series of mysterious attacks aboard Voyager leads him to a most unlikely suspect: himself.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Critical Care
programme.desc: Season 7, Episode 5 The Doctor is forced to work on an alien ship where patients' care is determined by their social status instead of medical need.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Inside Man
programme.desc: Season 7, Episode 6 Starfleet Lt. Barclay's hologram convinces Janeway to pursue a dangerous, untested plan to bring Voyager home.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Body And Soul
programme.desc: Season 7, Episode 7 The Doctor experiences physical sensations for the first time after Seven downloads his matrix into her body.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Nightingale
programme.desc: Season 7, Episode 8 With Voyager under repair, Harry seizes a chance to prove himself as a commander but finds that being a starship captain is more than he bargained for.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager - Flesh & Blood, Part 1
programme.desc: Season 7, Episode 9 The Doctor is torn between his duty to Voyager and his conscience when warrior holograms rebel against their Hirogen creators.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 1 After 46 years, LA homicide detectives take a Lover's Lane bandit who also gunned down two police officers into custody. Then, DNA testing helps lead police in Florida to a suspected killer, however, the killer has an identical twin.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 15 Fire investigator Jack Malooly helps crack the case of an arsonist and killer who set fires to collect insurance money, and a prison inmate tells a detective that he can't help him with his current investigation, but knows about a 15-year-old murder.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - The Merry Widow (#53)/The Missing Informant (#15)
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 4 In 1983, Navy seamen Sonny Grotton left base for a long weekend at home. But as he pulled into his driveway, a gunman killed him. And in 1993, former state trooper Doug Wright claimed his estranged wife shot and killed herself in their home.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 2 With access to the San Francisco Police Department's work, including saliva samples taken from letters the infamous Zodiac Killer sent 30 years ago, we reevaluate the case of the serial killer who began terrorizing California in the late 1960s.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 3, Episode 3 While hiking with husband Dennis in Montana, Leslee Larson fell into Wolf Creek. Then Dennis is convicted of murdering his wife, while in Main. And 15-year-old papergirl Penny Parker goes missing, then her body is found by a search volunteer.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 24 A bloody dagger and a phone tap help detectives solve a 20-year-old murder case. And DNA taken from an eyelash found on a dead prostitute's body brings a killer to justice.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 25 A murderer's saliva, found on envelopes, helps seal his doom 37 years after his first killing. And Colorado police crack a cold case 24 years later when they take a DNA sample from the victim's son that proves that his father murdered his mother.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 14 In Wisconsin, advances in forensic clay modeling help investigators identify a murder victim whose skin was stripped from her head, neck, and legs. And in California, police track down two boys who enjoy satanic rituals and setting fires.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 11 A boy's toy Batmobile car provides an important clue for detectives struggling to make a case against a serial killer who stalks and kills waitresses.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Traces Of Murder/The Bathtub Killer
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 9 A killer helps convict himself when he boasts about his crime to prison cellmates; and New Hampshire investigators probing the murder of a pregnant woman found raped, strangled, and dumped into her bathtub, get a new lead.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 19 Cops finally close in on a serial killer with the help of the Internet. And a drug trafficker jumps bail goes into the bike shop business and helps pioneer the sport of mountain biking while he's on the lam.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 15 Police solve a murder when divers find a skeleton in a car at the bottom of a river, and a dead dog's DNA helps crack open a 6-year-old case.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic - Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Season 5, Episode 20 DNA found on a marijuana joint in Florida in 2005 helps to solve the 1988 rape and murder of a California woman. And a cold case of murder in Illinois heats up when a jailhouse lawyer turns jailhouse snitch.

programme.title: MST3K: Racket Girls - Racket Girls
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 16 A gym owner gets into trouble, becoming the target of the mob and the law. The 1950 short presents a high school couple rushing into marriage, and the marriage counselor who talks them out of it.

programme.title: Side Hackers - Side Hackers
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 A motorcycle racer and a violent stunt rider start a war of vengeance against each other. Joel and the Bots write a song inspired by the movie and chat with a few characters from the film on the Hexfield.

programme.title: Film Crew: Hollywood After Dark - Film Crew: Hollywood After Dark
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 The Film Crew gives a commentary track to Walk the Angry Beach, aka Hollywood After Dark, featuring Rue McClanahan as a stripper.

programme.title: MST3K Shorts - MST3K Shorts: Keeping Clean And Neat
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 21 Don't leave the house before watching this indispensable guide to hygiene.

programme.title: MST3K: The Shape Of Things To Come - MST3K: The Shape Of Things To Come
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Emily's crew watch three humans and their robot friend defend the moon colonies in H.G. Well's THE SHAPE OF THINGS TO COME (1979).

programme.title: MST3K: Demon Squad - MST3K: Demon Squad
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Joel's crew watch as a paranormal investigator tries to save the world in DEMON SQUAD (2019), and the original test subject returns.

programme.title: Mystery Science Theater 3000: The Killer Shrews - The Killer Shrews
programme.desc: Season 4, Episode 7 An experiment on a remote island goes awfully awry when Professor Marlowe Cragis and his research team accidentally create giant, venomous shrews.

programme.title: MST3K: Santo In The Treasure Of Dracula - MST3K: Santo In The Treasure Of Dracula
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Jonah's crew watch SANTO IN THE TREASURE OF DRACULA (1969). The Mads introduce the Gizmoplex.

programme.title: MST3K - MST3K
programme.desc: no info available

programme.title: A Tale of Two Cities - A Tale of Two Cities
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Based on Charles Dickens' classic, two identical men (both played by Chris Sarandon) - one from England and one from France - fall for the same woman during the height of the French Revolution.

programme.title: Christmas in Conway - Christmas in Conway
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Hoping it will be the perfect Christmas present for his wife (Mary-Louise Parker), a man (Andy Garcia) plans to construct a Ferris wheel in his backyard. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection.

programme.title: A Majestic Christmas - A Majestic Christmas
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Nell must take her hometown playhouse to a multiplex, against her own wishes. She hopes a crash course in Christmas will give the new owner, Connor, a change of heart. Stars Jerrika Hinton and Christian Vincent.

programme.title: Once Upon a Winter's Date - Once Upon a Winter's Date
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Katherine, a workaholic executive, endures the worst Valentine's Day date of her life. On her walk home, a gypsy weaves a magical spell on her and when she wakes up the next morning, she realizes it's Valentine's Day again.

programme.title: Pictures of Hollis Woods - Pictures of Hollis Woods
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Having run away from a succession of foster homes, a 12-year-old girl resorts to desperate measures to stay with the eccentric retired teacher who's made her feel like she's finally in the place where she belongs.

programme.title: The Magic of Ordinary Days - The Magic of Ordinary Days
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 Pregnant out of wedlock, an educated young woman is pressured by her father into an arranged marriage with a lonely farmer in this drama set during WWII. Stars Keri Russell and Skeet Ulrich.

programme.title: A Painted House - A Painted House
programme.desc: Season 1, Episode 1 10-year-old Luke had never kept a secret or told a lie. But when two groups of migrant workers-and two dangerous men-come to work the family's Arkansas cotton farm, mysteries suddenly flood Luke's world.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Paradise Lost
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 15 Colonel Maybourne visits O'Neill and claims to have a key to a cache of alien technology, but demands a presidential pardon in exchange for it. When SG-1 accompanies Maybourne to retrieve it, they find his intentions may not be all they seem.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Metamorphosis
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 16 SG-1 discovers that Nirrti is mutating the inhabitants of an unexplored planet with a machine that rearranges their DNA. Captured in an attempt to stop her, O'Neill must find a way to escape before he and SG-1 are subjected to the same fate.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Disclosure
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 17 General Hammond and the Pentagon are forced to reveal the existence of the Stargate to other world governments. Senator Kinsey suggests that General Hammond be relieved of his command and that the civilian-run NID oversee the Stargate program.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Forsaken
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 18 SG-1 discovers three human survivors on an off-world planet who claim to be under attack by hostile aliens. While Carter helps repair the ship's computer, she learns that the survivors are hiding a secret…and things may not be all they seem.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - The Changeling
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 19 Teal'c mysteriously begins to hallucinate and is haunted by visions of an existence where he is a human being. As his paranoia deepens, Teal'c must rely on the help of friend Daniel Jackson to determine where his dreams end...and his reality begins.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Memento
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 20 SG-1 accompanies the X-53 on its voyage into deep space. When the ship drops out of hyperspace, SG-1 is stranded with no means of getting back to Earth. Their only option lies in exploring a nearby planet where a Stargate is thought to be located.

programme.title: Stargate SG-1 - Prophecy
programme.desc: Season 6, Episode 21 SG-1 encounters a civilization desperate to be freed from the clutches of a Goa'uld. While on the planet, Jonas falls ill. His illness is diagnosed as a brain tumor but it gives him the ability to see the future...where SG-1 are walking into a trap!

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - Instinct
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 7 Beckett begins experimenting with a new treatment that could turn the Wraiths into humans. The team finds a young Wraith girl, who could be Beckett's first patient. Having been raised by a human, the girl is eager, and reckless, to try anything.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - Conversion
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 8 After being injected with Beckett's Wraith treatment, Sheppard's life is in danger as he slowly is transforming into an Iratus bug hybrid. The team rushes to find a cure and reverse the side effects, but in the end, it might be up to Sheppard.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - Aurora
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 9 Sheppard (Joe Flanigan) and the team discover an Ancient warship called Aurora that is existing in suspended animation. Sheppard boards their ship via a virtual environment, in the hopes of learning valuable information from the Ancients.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - The Lost Boys
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 10 The team is kidnapped by none other than Lt. Aiden Ford who has put together his own team of super soldiers, men who have taken the Wraith enzyme. Ford's team intends to destroy a Hive Ship to prove how amazing and powerful the enzyme is.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - The Hive
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 11 The team is taken hostage by the Wraith after an attempt to destroy the Hive fails. Sheppard soon finds himself in front of the Wraith Queen, who wants answers. McKay returns to Atlantis in the hopes to convince the guards to help rescue the team.

programme.title: Stargate Atlantis - Epiphany
programme.desc: Season 2, Episode 12 The team discovers a device created by the Ancients that, without warning, pulls Sheppard in. As the team scrambles to release him from the strange place he is stuck in, McKay discovers that time moves differently inside.
